sentences.english: They all wore the most expensive clothes and had beautiful, long, curly hair.
sentences.chinese: 她们都穿着最昂贵的衣服，留着长长的美丽的鬈发。

sentences.english: Car fans always post this kind of articles.
Her corn-coloured ringlets hung gaily about her face.
sentences.chinese: 她的玉米色的鬈发妩媚地挂在她的脸上。

sentences.english: When Sun Quan reached the city walls, arrows rained down on him, and one struck his plumed helmet.
sentences.chinese: 权自到城下看时，城上箭如雨发，射中孙权麾盖。

sentences.english: If you order in the morning, we have more than four hours.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是在白天发的订单，就会超过四个小时。

sentences.english: A little leaven leaveneth the whole lump.
sentences.chinese: 一点面酵能使全团都发起来。

sentences.english: Every day, 30 lorries and containers will be made overseas Anping wire mesh.
sentences.chinese: 每天有30辆货车及集装箱将安平丝网发往外地。

sentences.english: I do not receive your message, please resend it to me.
sentences.chinese: 我没有收到你的电报，请重新发一份给我。

sentences.english: EMMA NORTHEY: "The children were each given a passport."
sentences.chinese: 每个孩子都发了一个护照。

sentences.english: Stroke the cat to make it purr then click on the Cinderella.
sentences.chinese: 点击这个猫使它发声音，然后点灰姑娘。

sentences.english: The e-mail you sent yesterday was returned as undeliverable.
sentences.chinese: 你昨天发的邮件被退回来了。

sentences.english: Yet the rate of new infections is currently outstripping supply.
sentences.chinese: 然而新发感染率目前仍然超过了供应量。

sentences.english: Sweat pants, hair tied, chillin with no makeup on.
sentences.chinese: 长运动裤，发带，不化妆的放松。

sentences.english: Had a Cowlick In Its Hair…And Didn't Pull a Face When Photographed.
sentences.chinese: 发一团糟，拍照的时候也没有做鬼脸。

sentences.english: Apply solution to the tube and allow to become tacky .
sentences.chinese: 在内胎上涂抹胶水并让它发粘。

sentences.english: And you can probably email the admissions office with any questions.
sentences.chinese: 如果有什么疑问，也可以给招生办发电子邮件。
